title: Hellrider Longbow
content:
Hellrider Longbow Uncommon 2~9 Damage 1d8+1Piercing Heightened Awareness: Gain a +3 bonus to initiative rolls and Advantage on Perception Ability Checks. Fiendish Fire: Once per turn, a creature hit by this weapon will possibly be afflicted with Faerie Fire. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This longhorn was forged from the remnants of Stanislan the Silver's shield, found near the wreckage of Castle Ravenloft some years ago. Longbow Two-Handed 18m 1.1 770

Hellrid
